verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Almost persuaded Now to believe Almost persuaded Christ to receive Seems now some soul to say Go Spirit go away Some more convenient day On Thee I'll call{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Almost persuaded Come come today Almost persuaded Turn not away Jesus invites you here Angels are ling'ring near Prayers rise from hearts so dear O wand'rer come{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Almost persuaded Harvest is past Almost persuaded Doom comes at last Almost cannot avail Almost is but to fail Sad sad that bitter wail Almost but lost{/lang-eng}
